mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trips (loginId, title, start_date, end_date, tripPlan) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{title}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{tripPlan})
mapper.select: SELECT trip_id as tripId, loginId, title, start_date as startDate, end_date as endDate, createAt as createdDate, updateAt as modifiedDate FROM trips WHERE loginId = #{loginId} ORDER BY start_date DESC
